mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IG_qna VALUES ( nb_num.nextval, #{nb_title}, #{nb_content},1, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select qb_mal,qb_num,m_id,qb_title,qb_content,qb_groupnum,qb_readcount,qb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as qb_rnum,qb_mal,qb_num,m_id,qb_title,qb_content,qb_groupnum,qb_readcount,qb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_qna order by qb_groupnum desc)) where qb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_qna where nb_title like '%'||#{searchContent1}||'%' or nb_content like '%'||#{searchContent2}||'%' order by nb_regdate desc )) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_qna where nb_title like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by nb_regdate desc)) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}

select nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( select ROWNUM as nb_rnum,nb_num,nb_title,nb_content,nb_readcount,nb_regdate from( SELECT * FROM IG_qna where nb_content like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by nb_regdate desc)) where nb_rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
UPDATE IG_qna SET qb_readcount=qb_readcount+1 where qb_num=#{qb_num}
